name: Newtab UI Fixes by hkr
description: More user styles by me: http://userstyles.dreamflame.in/ -------- Sorry, this style is not maintained anymore. You might want to take a look at this. I bet you're gonna like it :) --- Mozilla's Aurora introduced a new feature a few days ago the new about:newtab page. However they currently disabled it. If you don't see it, go to about:config and change "browser.newtab.url" to "about:newtab" and "browser.newtabpage.enabled" to "true" :) Cheers!
